officers.title: President
officers.name: Everett Lewark
officers.bio: I'm a graduate student in the Computer Science program. My hobbies include 3D modeling, electronic music, and game development.
responsibilities: Lead meetings and delegate tasks to officers

officers.title: Secretary
officers.name: Autumn Luzovich
officers.bio: Hi there! I am a sophomore student pursuing a major in Computer Science. Security is a huge passion of mine, and I am especially fascinated by the tools and methods used to protect one's identity online. In my free time, I enjoy developing web applications and playing some video-games.
